Write an email
I go to my bed room and sit on the chair and in front of me is my desktop computer and start writing an email.


[WALK] <bathroom> (1.1)
[WALK] <chair> (1.1000)
[FIND] <chair> (1.1000)
[SIT] <chair> (1.1000)
[FIND] <computer> (1.1001)
[SWITCHON] <computer> (1.1001)
[TURNTO] <computer> (1.1001)
[LOOKAT] <computer> (1.1001)
[FIND] <keyboard> (1.1002)
[TYPE] <keyboard> (1.1002)
